item.title: DataPlane Broker Introduction
item.description: NFV-MANO data model and the WIM NFV management standardization is predominantly driven by the ETSI NFV SIG. The group develops a wide portfolio of standards and reference implementations, including the NFV-MANO architecture and data models.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing the DPB service The instructions assume a platform of Ubuntu 18.04. It can surely be adapted for other Linux platforms. Install Java 9 or later: sudo apt-get install openjdk-11-jdk Install other prerequisites:

item.title: 5th OSM Hackfest
item.description: Our project is going to present DPB and its integration with OSM in the 5th OSM Hackfest in Patra Greece. Demo material The presentation will include a demo provides on cross-site CDN service orchestration.
